description:
Do you have what it takes to steal the treasure without leaving a trace? Put your skills to the test and claim your prize!

Achieve your goal by any means necessary, whether through stealth, speed, or diversion. Use whatever tactics you can to avoid detection and always stay out of sight, or you'll regret it. 

Features:
- Complete over 250 unique levels!
- Avoid tricky obstacles and don't get caught!
- Use your hand to steal the riches!
- Equip awesome themes and skins!
- Enjoy funny sounds and visuals!

What are you waiting for? Start your journey and become a master thief today!
name: Thief Puzzle
